title: Beetonâ€™s Christmas Annual 1987: Sherlock Holmes
description: Two Sherlock Holmes pastiches and one of the original Conan Doyle short stories. New illustrations by C. Woolery. Includes a commentary and glossary. One of the pastiches deals with the mystery surrounding Sherlock Holmes's elder brother, Mycroft. The other pastiche is based on true events in the life of the Irish statesman and champion of home rule, Charles Stewart Parnell.The scandal at the Cavendish Card Club by Ian Malcolm EarlsonThe case of the Parnell forgery by Ian Malcolm EarlsonThe adventure of the blue carbuncle by Arthur Conan DoyleOriginal etchings and illustrations by C. Woolery.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
